reviews.author: Kyle S.
reviews.description: We're visiting the area to prepare for a future move, drove past and decided to stop in. So glad we did. My husband had the Texas Philly and I had the chicken pot pie. The pot pie was so good. The crust and gravy were perfect. I wish there was more crust. I had the lunch portion. I'm not sure if the regular portion is bigger but I definitely wanted more.

reviews.author: Shawna L.
reviews.description: We had 7 in our party and everyone loved their meal, especially the pulled pork. Atmosphere was great and so was the service. Vic was great at recommendations and was patient while we made our decisions. Will definitely be back.

reviews.author: Kat C.
reviews.description: Gave this place a try and was impressed. Ordered Mushroom burger and fish and chips for delivery. Very good.  The menu has a great selection to choose from. Prices are very reasonable. Great place to order from a bit to eat.

reviews.author: G G.
reviews.description: Specials were crazy good today. Cod for the fish today and app special was an excellent irish egg roll (corned beef and cabbage)

reviews.author: Jeff P.
reviews.description: I've been here for the last 3 fights and I'm watching the last one I will watch here. 15 bucks to watch on half the really poor quality TVs. Though that is just the tip of the iceberg. Got here 2 hours before the fight and they would not turn any of the TVs to the prelims out on the patio. We asked 3 times and the 3rd time they said they could not cause people wanted to watch the soccer game that wasn't even on yet, also we are the only people at the time watching on the patio. Next is there was no cover when we got here, walked in sat down been drinking and eating and they are coming around telling us we have to go buy 15 dollar tickets at the door. On top of that the food is not high quality but the most expensive on the square and the service just isn't really there.   Also half the TVs are the fight and they are small TVs! Like super and low quality  Just ripping regular people off cause they are the only people on the square that show the fights. Bad business.

reviews.author: Karin P.
reviews.description: WiFi password is Guest2018...  I haven't been to Sean Patrick's since I graduated from Texas State in 2011... Not much has changed and I'm glad for that. It was nice to reminisce.   Meet a couple for dinner while going through town. They recommended this place because they have "The Incredible Burger", a vegan burger option. They have driven to San Marcos a couple of times from Kyle just for that burger. One got it on a Patty Melt and said the Texas toast was the perfect addition. The other got it on a regular bun. Both with fries. Both disappeared quickly! They also had a Bloody Mary each. The staff was very accommodating in regards to one's request for extra olives.   My husband had the fish and chips Irish style, so a Guinness based batter. I had the fish and chips Texas style, so a corn meal based batter. Both were fantastic. I tried some of his. His better was crunchier and crisper than mine. Both were very good.  My husband had the Solid Gold lager. He said it was pretty light but good.   The overall noise got a little loud quickly but it's a Saturday night in a college town so that's not unexpected. There are a couple of pool tables and several TVs. It's a great college hang out place.   Lots of beer options.   My husband said there was a trough in the men's restroom... The ladies could have used some attention but mostly well maintained.

reviews.author: Connor B.
reviews.description: Two stars only for the food. Service was trash. Have to wait in line due to "Covid" yet no real Covid restrictions. Can't order another beer without getting back in a long line. Won't come here for at least another year until they fix some things.

reviews.author: Brandon K.
reviews.description: I've been going to Sean patricks for a couple years now regularly with my girlfriend and my service dog. Every time we go someone always makes a comment to me about how well trained and well behaved my service dog is, and this evening was no different in regards to that. I always had a great experience with nice employees who were very welcoming.  I've never had a worse customer service experience in my life as I did today. The manager on duty Marshall Wyatt or Wyatt Marshall kicked me and my service dog out because he didn't have a vest for show that says service dog on it from Amazon. I explained to him more than I legally needed to in regards to my service dog. He at first turned me over to his manager under him, who was very nice, as employees usually are at Sean Patrick's. I compromised with sitting outside as they were busy on the inside anyways, and I didn't want to cause any issues. Then we were getting stormed on outside with winds blowing everything off our table and getting rained on while we ate. We only needed to have their coverings for the outside patio rolled down, but they took forever, and after asking multiple times for someone to come take care of it, I began taking care of it myself when finally Marshall Wyatt or Wyatt Marshall comes out and attempts to take care of it, but the covering just kept flying into our table and hitting my girlfriend. While we are getting pummeled by their outside seating covering. I pointed at it while making eye contact with Mr Wyatt, he makes eye contact, but continues being fixated on a tv while he leisurely walks over to assist. He walks back inside after putting a chair in the way. Well, the chair blows back on us with the crazy winds. We walk inside and get harassed by a bar back because Marshall Wyatt instructed him to in regards to my service dog. After explaining the law to the bar back we sit down, and I determined it was time to talk to someone about the experience I've had tonight. I spoke with the manager under mr Wyatt. Again, she was very nice, welcoming, and apologetic. After speaking with her mr Wyatt comes over to ask me how he was "rude" to me. I explained to him my experience, and he proceeded to argue every detail to defend and deny his lousy service. I thought he would come over to take responsibility as a manager and apologize, so I was caught off guard and told him that I didn't want to hear his argument, he then snatched everything off our table and kicked myself and my girlfriend out, saying that my service dog was in there "illegally," even though I tried to explain to him that he can simply refer to the ADA website. I cannot say I will be coming back until Mr. Wyatt is gone.  Owner Brian Jeffrey, please make this right, and reach out to me. I will miss going to Sean Patrick's, but who my money goes to is a huge thing for me.

reviews.author: Alex N.
reviews.description: So the waitress said my buddy was good to bring the dog inside to order, but when he did the bartender told my buddy that he had to get the dog out of there since it didn't have a service vest on, and my buddy said sure and was telling his girlfriend the order then the bartender cussed him out saying did he fucking hear him, and to get the fucking dog out of there. He was the tall bug eyed one

reviews.author: Michael M.
reviews.description: If you are looking for some hardcore authentic snooty nosed Irish pub...don't come here (lad or lass).  You're NOT in Ireland!  This is Texas!  If you are looking for a place with some great food with an Irish flair, you are good to go.  If you like cold beer, and a great selection of it, again, you're good to go.  If you like good service, yep, good to go.   Lots of TV's.  Great place to take in a game.  Wonderful place to hang out in a college town and pass some time.  They've got pool tables, shuffleboard, a nice outdoor patio for you and your dog.    Overall, great drink selection.  Great beer selection.  Tasty food.  One of my SMTX faves, and certainly my GO-TO when I am in town!

reviews.author: David M.
reviews.description: Love the food here, good drink selection too. Great place to watch a Texas State away game.

reviews.author: Mari B.
reviews.description: 1st time here and we were beyond thrilled with the food, drinks and service. We were made aware of the specials immediately and offered lunch portions. Bangers and mash was excellent!  We will be back!

reviews.author: Kerra S.
reviews.description: I've been here before and previously would've probably given 3-4 stars , but they have definitely stepped their game up!!!  Me and my boyfriend came in to watch the World Cup game because I remembered this place had tons of tv's, and the most seating out of pretty much any bar in San Marcos . We ordered drinks , chili cheese fries, and a DELICIOUS 2$ scoop of pistachio almond ice cream in a waffle cone . All the food was awesome ( which I can't remember saying in past experiences .)   After the game we opted for some shuffle board and darts , which was a great end to an awesome World Cup game . Couldn't have asked for a better place/ environment for watching , enjoying great food, and hearing a lively crowd !!!

reviews.author: Kim C.
reviews.description: My husband and another couple came in to have a few drinks and some food. The other couple ordered fish and chips. When their order came out the fish and chips were awful, breading was soggy and the 'white' fish was grey in color, they were refunded the meal, but didn't want to take a chance on anything else. Later I went to use the restroom, only to be in a stall that has no toilet paper. Very disappointed as I was from out of town and looking to try something local. Very disappointed.

reviews.author: Ben S.
reviews.description: Love coming here this is one of my go to places in San Marcos. They have great food I recommend always getting a triple play for an appetizer! The beers always cold plus $6.50 mini pitchers on Fridays can't beat that!

reviews.author: Christie - Matt R.
reviews.description: This place is far from being like an Irish pub with Irish food. Any Non-American visiting would tell you Shepard's Pie is made with lamb and not beef.  It's ok to make it with beef but one must correct their menu as it's correctly called "Cottage Pie" when made with beef.   Blackjack Burger - Pretty Good Philly Cheese Steak - No Flavour (yes, there's a damn U in it) Smithwicks - Ran Out (pronounced incorrectly... don't say the W)  As a immigrant this is far from Irish, in fact so far removed from anything Irish it's an insult. No offense, but an American would never know the bloody difference! In addition, the bathrooms are named "Lasses" and "Boyos".... the ladies is a SCOTTISH name and the men's is WELSH name; no S at the end. This damn place needs to learn some shit really quickly, because they look like fuck'n idiots to everyone out of county.  Skip this shit-hole and get a decent beer and food at Aquabrew down the street... you were warned, so go ahead regret it at your leisure!

reviews.author: Stacy L.
reviews.description: My husband and I had drinks and dinner here last night. He ordered the pork sliders and they were horrible.  The meat tasted like it had been cooked for a week.  The BBQ sauce was gross.  I had the pretzel and it came from a box. I paid $9 for it. The drinks barely had a shot in them and were over priced. We won't waste our time going back.

reviews.author: J D.
reviews.description: Pros: Good draft beer selection; good pork chop; amazing in-house Guinness BBQ sauce; pretty good BBQ bacon burger (pro tip order BBQ sauce on side so you get a healthy helping); very good onion rings  Cons: Can be very loud; small dipping sauce containers (may charge extra for BBQ sauce)

reviews.author: aimee r.
reviews.description: Tables are more like 4 feet apart not even close to the 6ft  suggested by CDC!  It's fine on the off hours but by 5pm, all the non science believers show up  and ignore social distancing. I suggest coming early and leaving by 5pm so you can  avoid community spread. IMO.  Otherwise the staff , and food are fantastic! If it wasn't 2020 pandemic this place would be awesome. But the crowds were out of control.

reviews.author: E. A. J.
reviews.description: First time at this bar, good atmosphere and good deals on beer. Server was okay, nothing special but that's not why we came. First off we ordered fried jalapeños and got fried pickles, but didn't say anything because it wasn't that big of a deal. The issue was at the end. We tried to tell him separate tabs, handed him a 20 and a credit card for the two tabs. He kept the 20 and didn't bring back any change, and charged all of the drinks on one tab- never saw him again. We were in a rush so couldn't track him down to correct it. Needles to say, a little disappointed...

name: Red Bus Food Park and Bar

reviews.author: Cynthia C.
reviews.description: Great food, great service.    The owners are amazing !!.  Can't wait to go back!!!!! Entertainment is on point and the variety of beer and wine options is great! You won't regret coming here!

reviews.author: William C.
reviews.description: Had a fantastic savory sliced Brisket and Jalepeno sandwich at Deuce BBQ and enjoyed some outdoor games and drinks at the Red bus bar.  They had music and a comedy line-up at the back of the park for entertainment and everyone is so friendly and new owners are very accommodating. There is a lot going on and the place is bigger than it looks with loads of food choices and pockets of indoor and outdoor eating spaces to relax, have a drink. I will be back the next time I'm in San Marcos!

reviews.author: Teresa C.
reviews.description: Awesome food park. Has a variety of food trucks and beer and wine. Tonight the entertainment has begun and it's a great evening to be outside. There's a musician and comedian. Fun!
